channel.title: [PI] Special Drain REP++
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
I recently added Korasi with spec to my server, special works fine, everything is exactly how I want it, except for one thing, the special attack does not drain when being used.
If you need any additional information, please let me know!
Thanks in advance, and Rep++ for help!
